entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 11:00 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
